name: Her New Memory - Hentai Simulator
description:
Plot:One day, you find a shivering, barefooted girl in ragged clothes knocking on your door. She has no recollections of her past, and she doesn’t even remember her name. You can help her recover her memories or let her stay at your side forever. You’re no longer lonely from this day on.Features:Customize your girl:
o Buy her clothes, underwear, socks and accessories;
o Change her hairstyle and hair color;
Buy new furniture;
Interactive sex scenes;
Colorful art;
Mini-games;
Ability to play with one hand. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
